verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon מָחֲלַ֗ת <S%H4257><s%> upon Mahalath מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> hath said נָבָ֣ל <S%H5036><s%> The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> [There is] no God הִֽ֝שְׁחִ֗יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> Corrupt וְהִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <S%H8581><s%> are they and have done abominable עָ֝֗וֶל <S%H5766><s%> iniquity אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <S%H8259><s%> looked down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon בְּנֵ֫י <S%H1121><s%> upon the children אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> if there were מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> [any] that did understand דֹּ֝רֵ֗שׁ <S%H1875><s%> that did seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

כֻּלּ֥וֹ <S%H3605><s%> Every סָג֮ <S%H5472><s%> Every one of them is gone back יַחְדָּ֪ו <S%H3162><s%> they are altogether נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <S%H444><s%> become filthy אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good אֵ֝֗ין <S%H369><s%> is no גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יָדְעוּ֮ <S%H3045><s%> no knowledge פֹּ֤עֲלֵ֫י <S%H6466><s%> Have the workers אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <S%H398><s%> ? who eat up עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> my people אָ֣כְלוּ <S%H398><s%> [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> upon God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no קָרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> they have not called

שָׁ֤ם ׀ <S%H8033><s%> There פָּֽחֲדוּ־ <S%H6342><s%> fear פַחַד֮ <S%H6343><s%> There were they in great לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֪יָה֫ <S%H1961><s%> had been פָ֥חַד <S%H6343><s%> [where] no fear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> was for God פִּ֭זַּר <S%H6340><s%> hath scattered עַצְמ֣וֹת <S%H6106><s%> the bones חֹנָ֑ךְ <S%H2583><s%> of him that encampeth הֱ֝בִשֹׁ֗תָה <S%H954><s%> [against] thee thou hast put [them] to shame כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> because God מְאָסָֽם׃ <S%H3988><s%> hath despised

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <S%H6726><s%> [were come] out of Zion יְשֻׁע֪וֹת <S%H3444><s%> the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> bringeth back אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> When God שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people יָגֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> shall be glad יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> [and] Israel
